snippet.title: My Father Lied - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
Solve the puzzles, learn what happened, and explore what's hidden to know what secrets your father kept from you.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2488850/MY_FATHER_LIED/

My Father Lied is a mystery puzzle game that follows a daughter's search for the secret of her father's 20 years disappearance.

Think MYST, ESCAPE ROOM, and H. P. LOVECRAFT, and you will get... MY FATHER LIED.

Twitter: https://x.com/lunargamesUruk
TikTok:   / lunargames.assyria  
Discord:   / discord  
Instagram:   / lunargames.sumeria  
Website: https://lunargames.co.uk/
